title: Bound by Magic
description: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned.Elven sorcerer Calatin should have known that loving and leaving Medeia, the powerful female leader of Fearann's Guild of Magicians, would have consequences. Her curse strips him of his magic and tosses him into the human world. Bereft of all he once knew, Calatin finds a new purpose in protecting a mortal woman in constant fear of her life. But will he be able to return to his own world, and regain the powers that were seized from him?Adrienne, a young pharmacist, is a survivor. Since uncovering secrets she should never have known, she's forced to hide in a rural villageâ€”tracked down by ruthless killers, watched by the FBI. But will she learn to trust Cal, the strikingly handsome, but apparently crazy man she finds naked in her back garden? After all, he claims to have come from the lands of the Fae. Soon Adrienne will know that this realm of magic truly exists, and not only in the arms of her immortal lover ..."Bound by Magic" is the second book in Deborah Court's Elven Warrior Trilogy.
author: Deborah   Court
